issue.title: Splitwise Clone - Expense Sharing App
issue.body:
## Overview
Build a web app where friends can track shared expenses and settle debts. Think Splitwise but simpler.

## Core Features

### Authentication
- Email/password signup and login
- Protected routes - must be logged in to use the app

### Groups
- Create groups for different occasions (roommates, trips, dinners)
- Invite friends to groups by email
- See all your groups on a dashboard

### Expenses  
- Add expenses to a group (who paid, how much, what for)
- Split expenses equally among group members
- View expense history in a group

### Balances
- See who owes whom in each group
- Simplified debts (minimize number of transactions needed)
- Mark debts as settled

## Tech Stack
- **Frontend**: Next.js 14 with App Router, Tailwind CSS
- **Backend**: Next.js API routes
- **Database**: SQLite with better-sqlite3
- **Auth**: JWT tokens with jose, passwords hashed with bcryptjs

## Pages
- Landing page
- Login / Signup
- Dashboard (list of groups)
- Group detail (expenses, balances, members)
- Add expense form
- Create group form

## Quality
- Clean, modern UI
- Mobile responsive
- TypeScript throughout
- Proper error handling
